from sea to shining sea with my shenanigal.. - m4w

we started moving inland again...
unsure of our destination or if it even existed..
on the orient express..through latin america...
seeking swindlers...to take us to sea...
my hand in yours...no time for matinees in budapest..
passing rocks the size of gibralter..
shimmering beaches...that don't take a back seat to..but
the latrines...that would make third world countries cringe..
boomboxes the size of minivans...
and hundreds of nooks..where our bodies...
would be the cause of endless speculation...
I find that morbidly..satisfying..so please shoot to kill..
kill the script....the music starts to play...
play your whistle....summon the birds...
birds..perched...on a ledge..watching us...
us....finally...together....overlooking..sunset..
sunset..lighting up the river...and motel 6...and beautiful..
beautiful? new jersey?....we look around..
around us...its the 9th arrondissement..accordion music..
music to our ears..the sun sets..
sets like these...its just me you...and the lone ranger...(end script)
a baby suckles....at her mothers breast....
and I'm safe in your arms...breathing..
the world is at peace...weve come and we've conquered...
(or is it ..conquered and come?)
you own my heart...you own my body...
fuck staten island...fuck kentucky...
I want to to travel.....back to you...
always back to you...where everything disappears...
driverless cars...shine lights on us...
and we hide in our cave...
where we kiss...and conquer...
where we whisper..and feel things
we've never felt before..
it's you I need..
my shenanilove
